Articles.Content:
(I don't know if this is the right section for this)

One thing that bugged me in my 1.2 career is that you can only have 1 progression world firsts contract active at any time. Is there any way I can change that?

1 hour ago, rocketbuilder said:

(I don't know if this is the right section for this)

One thing that bugged me in my 1.2 career is that you can only have 1 progression world firsts contract active at any time. Is there any way I can change that?

We asked that during pre-release, and the somewhat sad answer was "no." Something about those contract is special and it would take a lot of work to make more than 1 at a time appear.

Damm it, thats annoying, but you should be able to have more than one.

Say you send a probe to duna that completes most of an explore contract but can't do the entire contract, and then you get a launch window to eve. If you launch that probe to eve then you cannot get an explore contract for eve. I wonder if you can change this with contract configurator?
